"Connectivity turned off, the Maps may not be displayed properly"

"I'm french IT Engineer, an Android & Web Developer and a tech enthusiast. I love all the good things internet, smartphones and applications brought to us.

I have been a CTO/Lead Developer of a successful startup in Paris for 3 years and I currently live in Tokyo.

I've also an interest into Artificial Intelligence et Problems Solving."

"This application is a multiple purpose application.
It serves as a showcase of what can I do with the Android framework when it comes to build Android applications. It also acts as a playground for me when I want to test new stuff like new libraries or new APIs. Of course I haven't be able to showcase ALL the things I have experienced with the Android framework in this little app but you can have a glimpse.
This application is open-sourced and all the source code can be found on Github :
https://github.com/FabriceMk/android-mycv
Fabrice Mongkhoune (FabriceMk)"
